text: The 2018 Rink Hockey Continental Cup was the 38th season of the Continental Cup, Europe's roller hockey Super Cup, organized by the World Skate Europe - Rink Hockey. Four teams from two federations played for the title on 29 and 30 September 2018 in Barcelos, Portugal. Spanish club Barcelona achieved their eighteenth title ever. == Teams == {| class="wikitable" |- !Team !Qualified as !Appearance |- | Barcelona |CERH European League champion |align=center|20th |- | Porto |CERH European League runner-up |align=center|5th |- | Lleida Llista Blava |CERS Cup champion |align=center|1st |- | Barcelos |CERS Cup runner-up |align=center|3rd |} ==Bracket== ==See Also== *World Skate Europe - all competitions ==References== ==External links== * 2018 Continental Cup at CERH website Category:Continental Cup (rink hockey) Continental Cup
title: 2018 Rink Hockey Continental Cup
